name: Gmail List Messages
description: Lists messages in the user's Gmail mailbox with optional search query.

inputs.name: maxResults
inputs.description: The maximum number of messages to return

inputs.name: pageToken
inputs.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page

inputs.name: labelIds
inputs.description: Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs (comma-separated)

inputs.name: includeSpamTrash
inputs.description: Include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results
